br.com.eventos.mbeans.org

Class ConsultasPagamentosGeralMB

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.eventos.mbeans.org.ConsultasPagamentosGeralMB

  • public class ConsultasPagamentosGeralMB
extends java.lang.Object
    MBeans for data handling of Global Pagar Payments Transactions.

      • getListaEventos

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getListaEventos()
        Get a List of Evento Events for a Dropdown Box. The list includes a String Message "Event" in the language of the corresponding Locale.
        Returns:
        the List of all specified Events.

      • getListaFornecedores

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getListaFornecedores()
        Get a List of Fornecedor Affiliates for a Dropdown Box. The list includes a String Message "Affiliate" in the language of the corresponding Locale. Which type is selected is determined by the tpFornecedor variable.
        Returns:
        the List of all specified Affiliates.

      • getListaContatos

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getListaContatos()

        Returns:
        the List of all specified FornecedorContato Contacts.

      • selecionarTipoFornecedor

        public void selecionarTipoFornecedor(javax.faces.event.ValueChangeEvent e)
        Load a List of either Fornecedor Affiliates for a Dropdown Box. The list includes a String Message "Affiliate" in the language of the corresponding Locale.
        Parameters:
        e - the ValueChangeEvent object that contains a short String of either a Personal or Corporate Affiliate.

      • selecionarFornecedor

        public void selecionarFornecedor(javax.faces.event.ValueChangeEvent e)
        Load an FornecedorContato Affiliate Contact list for a Dropdown Box. The list includes a String Message "Contacts" in the language of the corresponding Locale.
        Parameters:
        e - the ValueChangeEvent object that contains an ID of the selected Affiliate.

      • pagamento

        public java.lang.String pagamento(Pagar pagamento)
        Complete a Pagar Payment Transaction. After completed, redirect the user to the Payments List Page. Requires the user to have the "FIN_PAG_CON_PAGAR" permission.
        Parameters:
        pagamento - the Pagar Payment Transaction to be completed.
        Returns:
        a HTML page redirect.

      • editar

        public java.lang.String editar(Pagar pagar)
        Edit a Pagar Payment Transaction. Redirects the user to the Payment Editing Page. Requires the user to have the "FIN_PAG_CON_EDITAR" permission.
        Parameters:
        pagar - the Pagar Payment Transaction to be edited.
        Returns:
        a HTML page redirect.
